description: What could I do with https://emelia.io and 19€/month (3 accounts included)? 💪 Send cold email sequences timed by day, hour or minute ⏱ Set limits and conditions ⚒ Build strong reportings and A/B Test 🤖 Automate workflows with Zapier, n8n or Make https://app.emelia.io/signup?lng=en
name: Emelia
tagline: The simplest and most affordable cold mailing solution
